Typealiases.html#/Addr.name: Addr
Typealiases.html#/Addr.abstract: A node address represented as a byte array.

Typealiases.html#/UBID.name: UBID
Typealiases.html#/UBID.abstract: Ultralight Beam specific IDs represented as byte arrays.

Structs/Message.html#/origin.name: origin
Structs/Message.html#/origin.abstract: The origin of the message, or the original sender.

Structs/Message.html#/init(proto:recipie.name: init(proto:recipient:from:origin:message:)
Structs/Message.html#/init(proto:recipie.abstract: Initializes a message with the passed data.

Structs/Message.html.name: Message
Structs/Message.html.abstract: Message represents the message sent between nodes.

Protocols/TransportDelegate.html#/transp.name: transport(_:didReceiveData:from:)
Protocols/TransportDelegate.html#/transp.abstract: Called when a transport receives new data.

Protocols/Transport.html#/peers.name: peers
Protocols/Transport.html#/peers.abstract: The peers a specific transport can send messages to.

Protocols/Transport.html#/send(message:t.name: send(message:to:)
Protocols/Transport.html#/send(message:t.abstract: Send implements a function to send messages between nodes using the transport.

Protocols/Transport.html#/listen().name: listen()
Protocols/Transport.html#/listen().abstract: Listen implements a function to receive messages being sent to a node.

Protocols/NodeDelegate.html#/node(_:didR.name: node(_:didReceiveMessage:)
Protocols/NodeDelegate.html#/node(_:didR.abstract: Called when a node receives a message.

Protocols/NodeDelegate.html.name: NodeDelegate
Protocols/NodeDelegate.html.abstract: NodeDelegate is used to handle the receiving of messages.

Protocols/Transport.html.name: Transport
Protocols/Transport.html.abstract: Transports are used to send messages between nodes using different methods, e.g. wifi direct or bluetooth.

Protocols/TransportDelegate.html.name: TransportDelegate
Protocols/TransportDelegate.html.abstract: TransportDelegate is used to handle the receiving data.

Classes/Node.html#/add(transport:).name: add(transport:)
Classes/Node.html#/add(transport:).abstract: Adds a new transport to the list of known transports.

Classes/Node.html#/remove(transport:).name: remove(transport:)
Classes/Node.html#/remove(transport:).abstract: Removes a transport from the list of known transports.

Classes/Node.html#/send(_:).name: send(_:)
Classes/Node.html#/send(_:).abstract: Sends a message through the current transports.

Classes/Node.html.name: Node
Classes/Node.html.abstract: An ultralight beam node, handles the interaction with transports and services.

Classes/Peer.html.name: Peer
Classes/Peer.html.abstract: Peer represents the nodes a transport can communicate with.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
